name: @sudoplatform/sudo-di-cloud-agent-example-js
description: Example app to show how to integrate with the Sudo DI Cloud Agent SDK
author: Anonyome Labs, Inc.

scripts.install-deps: cd frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && yarn install
scripts.build: cd frontend && yarn build && cd ../backend && yarn build
scripts.verify: cd frontend && yarn verify && cd ../backend && yarn verify
scripts.lint: cd frontend && yarn lint && cd ../backend && yarn lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd frontend && yarn lint:fix && cd ../backend && yarn lint:fix
scripts.clean: cd frontend && yarn clean && cd ../backend && yarn clean
scripts.clean:all: cd frontend && yarn clean:all && cd ../backend && yarn clean:all
